Natural Language Query: Update the discount percentage for product category 'Clothing'
SQL Query: UPDATE categories SET discount_percentage = 15 WHERE name = 'Clothing'

Show the names of all products in stock
SQL Query: SELECT name FROM products WHERE quantity > 0

SQL Query: UPDATE customers SET credit_limit = credit_limit * 1.2 WHERE customer_id = 789
